channel.title: Comments on: Social Networks And Me
channel.description: Amit Schreiber's Blog | הבלוג של עמית שרייבר

item.title: By: Amit
item.dc:creator: Amit
item.description: :) Nice of you to read the comments
item.content:encoded: :) Nice of you to read the comments

item.title: By: Ariel Cohen
item.dc:creator: Ariel Cohen
item.description:
That answers my question in the previous post...
Maybe you should create tomorrow's hip and not an application for yesterday's? More chances to get money I believe...
item.content:encoded:
That answers my question in the previous post…

Maybe you should create tomorrow’s hip and not an application for yesterday’s? More chances to get money I believe…

item.title: By: Amit
item.dc:creator: Amit
item.description: I will start... maybe I'll even throw in an Android app for the $10 Million challenge: http://www.google.com/intl/en/press/pressrel/20071112_android_challenge.html
item.content:encoded:
I will start… maybe I’ll even throw in an Android app for the $10 Million challenge:
http://www.google.com/intl/en/press/pressrel/20071112_android_challenge.html

item.title: By: xtreeq
item.dc:creator: xtreeq
item.description: I think you should just start writing the app and Facebook is as good a start as any. Stop thinking about it too much.
item.content:encoded:
I think you should just start writing the app and Facebook is as good a start as any.
Stop thinking about it too much.
